input.sentences: all dressed up ready to get this wedding started .
husband an wife newly married looking happy and beautiful .
they both look so happy and very comfortable with eachother .
riding off in to the sunset to start a new life as husband and wife .
taking a moment to have a little golf date is new to me | but whatever makes them happy .
output.sentences: A bride zipped up her white dress while looking at her reflection in the mirror.
All full of smiles the bride and groom posed to capture these moments.
The groom relaxed in his spot on the couch taking in the view of his breathtaking wife.
After the photos, the bride and groom made their way into their getaway car.
But they soon realized getaway cars were overrated when there was a perfectly good golf cart calling their now shared last name.
